edu.mines.jtk.dsp

Interface Tensors2

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EigenTensors2

    public interface Tensors2
    An interface for 2D tensors used in anisotropic 2D image processing. Each tensor is a symmetric positive-semidefinite 2-by-2 matrix: 
    
 A = |a11 a12|
     |a12 a22|

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void getTensor(int i1, int i2, float[] a)
      Gets tensor elements for specified indices.

    • Method Detail

      • getTensor

        void getTensor(int i1,
             int i2,
             float[] a)
        Gets tensor elements for specified indices.
        Parameters:
        i1 - index for 1st dimension.
        i2 - index for 2nd dimension.
        a - array {a11,a12,a22} of tensor elements.
